problemSection.title: Posting on LinkedIn is essential, but time-consuming.
problemSection.description: Staying consistent, engaging, and authentic is almost impossible alone. Solo in Public fixes that — with AI, purpose, and zero friction.

solutionSection.title: Meet the Pro-founder Agent
solutionSection.subtitle: Your AI co-pilot to build in public with purpose and consistency.

features.title: Creates real content
features.description: Generates posts from your journey, metrics, learnings, and milestones. Authenticity at scale.

features.title: Schedules automatically
features.description: Analyzes performance and schedules your content at the best times to maximize reach.

features.title: Engages ethically
features.description: Interacts naturally in your niche, building valuable connections without sounding robotic.

features.title: Learns and improves
features.description: Understands your tone and evolves with you, providing insights to optimize your strategy.

engagementSection.title: Ethical engagement, elevated
engagementSection.subtitle: Go beyond likes. Build genuine connections with an agent that understands people.

features.title: Surfaces relevant conversations
features.description: Monitors your niche and surfaces the most valuable discussions for you to join, where your voice matters most.

features.title: Drafts personalized replies
features.description: Uses context and your interaction history to craft authentic responses that reflect your tone and expertise.

features.title: Suggests the ideal timing
features.description: Keeps engagement natural by suggesting the best moments to jump in, avoiding automation spikes.

differentiatorSection.title: Why is it different?
differentiatorSection.highlight: Solo in Public automates purposeful growth.
differentiatorSection.supporting: The method not only boosts launches, but also powers ongoing optimization and growth for your SaaS, helping you evolve constantly and strengthen your authority.

advancedFeaturesSection.title: Take your Building in Public to the next level
advancedFeaturesSection.subtitle: Exclusive Pro Founder features to accelerate your growth and impact.

features.title: Multi-agent personas
features.description: Create and manage different communication styles. Let the “Visionary Agent” inspire and the “Technical Agent” dive deep.

features.title: AI content calendar
features.description: Receive an AI-generated posting calendar based on trending topics in your niche, optimized for relevance and timing.

features.title: Public dashboards
features.description: Generate shareable progress reports with one click. Celebrate wins and learnings with your community.
